Nightlight::

Nightligh had a bad feeling said softly "I did that you remember 
something... horrible, didn't you?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Blackfang took a deep breath. He had been told of Airrazor, the 
cousin 
> he never knew, and he never forgave Megatron for having killed her 
so 
> coldly.
> 
> Blackfang: It's a long story. To make it short, let's say that 
> Megatron and his maniacal ego wanted to gather energon here, but 
they 
> ended up finding out this was Earth. You see, predacons aren't 
quite 
> dominant on Cybertron, but a lot of them are working on this.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Nightlight::
> > 
> > "That's horrible..."said Nightlight "why did this fight began?'"
